other_tests.findings: Heterozygous Thr328Lys mutation in the gene for coagulation factor XII, characteristic of type III hereditary angioedema.
Reduced carboxypeptidase N activity (27.9 nmol/min/mL [normal range, 35.7 to 55.3 nmol/min/mL]).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient has not received sitagliptin or had new episodes of swelling since this exacerbation 4 years ago.
